sentences.en: American flounder having a yellowish tail.
sentences.cn: 有微黄色尾巴的美洲比目鱼.

sentences.en: Earlier writers, even before the Civil War, flounder and contradict themselves when discussing the problem.
sentences.cn: 早期作家, 甚至在南北战争以前, 读到这个问题都要瞠目结舌,前后矛盾.

sentences.en: Fish such as cod, flounder, and haddock are caught in this way.
sentences.cn: 鳕 、 比目鱼 、 黑线鳕等都是用这种方法捕捞的.

sentences.en: Flounder: Yeah, sure , it, it's great. Now let's get out here.
sentences.cn: 弗朗达: 是啊, 的确, 太好了. 我们走吧.

sentences.en: Foreign students often flounder in so unstructured an academic environment.
sentences.cn: 留学生经常在这种松散的学术环境中张徨失措.

sentences.en: He couldn't swim and just flounder about in the water.
sentences.cn: 他不会游泳,只是在水里胡乱地划动.

sentences.en: His flounder in pain and sufferings dying.
sentences.cn: 他挣扎着在痛苦中死去.

sentences.en: Juvenile spot moves into shallow water to escape from flounder.
sentences.cn: 小黄鲾游到浅水地带以躲避比目鱼.

sentences.en: More and more firms are floundering because of the recession.
sentences.cn: 由于经济衰退，越来越多的公司举步维艰。

sentences.en: Mr. Dambar had loaded his plate with stuffed flounder.
sentences.cn: 但拔先生的餐盘里盛满了填馅的比目鱼。

sentences.en: She could only flounder through her song.
sentences.cn: 她只能慌乱地唱完她的歌.

sentences.en: The excellence poet gross flounder both ends in idiot and balance.
sentences.cn: 优秀的诗人总挣扎在白痴与天平的两端.

sentences.en: The plane had begun to drop and flounder wildly.
sentences.cn: 飞机已经开始下降,剧烈地颠簸着.

sentences.en: We flounder through deep snow to get to the store.
sentences.cn: 我们费力地踏著厚厚的积雪去那家店里.

sentences.en: We have filet of sole , flounder, and baked shad.
sentences.cn: 我们有上等螺沙鱼排 、 比目鱼, 还有烤鲱鱼.

sentences.en: What a pity that his career was left to flounder.
sentences.cn: 多么可惜，他的事业深陷困局。

words.tran_cn: 挣脱；挣扎；衣裙上的荷边装饰
挣扎，折腾；错乱地做事或说话

trans.tran_en: a European flatfish, Platichthys flesus having a greyish-brown body covered with prickly scales: family Pleuronectidae: an important food fish

trans.tran_cn: (在水中)挣扎, 困难地往前走, 踌躇, 发慌
trans.tran_en: to have a lot of problems and be likely to fail completely

trans.tran_cn: 挣扎，折腾，着慌，勉强应付，行为言语错乱
